biotools.summary: PEMPNI (Predictors for Effects of Mutations on PNIs) is a computational method that could effectively predict the effects of missense mutations on protein-DNA and protein-RNA interactions. This algorithm includes an energy module and a nonenergy module. The former is based on the novel geometric partition-based energy features, and the latter is based on the structural and sequence features. The integration of multifaceted information could generate more robust predictions.
